II. Purpose of Addendum
This report is being generated due to the program relocating from 511 E. Larned
Street, Detroit, MI. 48226 to 1906 25th Street, Detroit, MI. 48216. The Licensee was
licensed at the prior address on Larned Street on 08/01/1992. To ensure policies
and procedures are in compliance as well as Child Placing rules for facilities.
III. Methodology
Onsite visit took place on 09/06/2018. It is a centrally located office building just
west of corktown and convenient to major bus routes. Parking is readily available
and the building is completely handicapped assessable.
The suite is 5000 square feet. It has ample office space for staff and conference
and family visitation rooms. Homes for Black Children will occupy the first floor and
garden level of the building. The building was built in 1926 and has been restored
by Southwest Housing Solution and it has been upgraded to include modern safety
features.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The program is in substantial compliance with applicable statutes and administrative
rules.
V. Recommendation
I recommend continue current license status.
